channel.title: What's this? A Sorcerer win?
channel.description:
[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/860614032587020974/D1C92A1DB43903E54595178EA0863725AD02B168/[/img]
**Game Story**
Random killed the alch first night. King mentioned that he knew it was a sorcerer game so I checked back up to see if anyone whispered king (3 was only person)
Despite his pleas for help, I killed him over 2 nights. He was salty
Accidently killed the last cult Day 5, and then slowly picked off the BD with the King wasting time and confusing people. Helped out when A hunter retributioned another BD.
Carried until game end, with Evil King ensuring the rubbish cult also won.
Game Finished Day 11
